phrases: Even if they launch Kataphrakts, do not engage.
We will use Kaufmann 6 as an anchor to perform wire swingby
They are in the same boat!
Hit'them before they can get close!
We cannot hit them at this range!
Do not hold back on the bullets!
How can he land any shots in this wind?
I am this close, so how can that be?!
The blessings of my lady, Princess Royal Asseylum, are upon me.
Ever since I was young, I idolized Earth.
That world has the privilege of water and air and sunlight,
and is blessed with an abundance of life and natural resources.
I once lost my life on that world of Earth.
And then, my eyes were opened to the truth.
How outrageous it was for the Terrans
to live among that bounty without appreciating it.
A foolish race that covets resources, destroys nature,
and is devoted to the pursuit of pleasure.
We must not allow them to have their way with this precious world of Earth.
I, Asseylum Vers Allusia, Princess Royal of the Vers Empire,
praise and commend all those Orbital Knights who have died
in the name of that noble because.
What is the point of watching that pirate broadcast of theirs?
I am curious, that is all...
I wonder what happened to the princess?
I thought she was on Earth's side.
Maybe she lost hope in there ever being a peaceful resolution.
If there is fighting, it is only natural that she would side with Mars.
She is a Martian, after all.
I was just thinking that this might be our last chance to relax.
Yeah, we board the ship tomorrow and lift off the day after that.
You sure it is not him you are thinking about?
Do not just stand there, people!
Are you training or are not you?!
We plan to be able to lift off the day after tomorrow.
Troops whose arrival was delayed should be here by tomorrow.
I wonder what the top brass are thinking?
We will essentially be going into battle with our vitals exposed.
If those vitals are competent enough, it changes things.
They are telling us to put it to effective use.
Hard to believe we will be fighting side by side again...
You can say that again, madam.
It is a miracle he made it back alive.
That landing was so skillful, one would never guess we are in an uneven gravity field.
Your skills have improved even more, Slaine.
Your compliment honors me, Count Saazbaum.
Granting you the title of knight was a wise decision.
I destroyed some four enemy units.
There is no need for milord with me.
But you are older than I am, and...
That does not change the fact that you are a knight, Milord.
And I ask that you refrain from using mister with me, Milord Slaine.
You seem to be in good spirits,
The invasions of North and South America are complete,
As for Eurasia and the Far East, UEF counterattacks continue
due to the surrender of the Landing Castles there.
Will I be able to go down to Earth?
We expect the UE to be exhausted soon.
When that happens, you, who inherit the bloodline
of the Emperor of Vers, will be installed as
I have never been pleased with the blood flowing in my veins.
On the contrary, I find it repugnant.
Am I only being kept alive because of the value of my blood?
To merely be a tool that exists to awaken Aldnoah.
It was you who extended the hand of friendship to me, Count Saazbaum.
Even if I curse my blood, I am grateful to you.
Will you teach me of Earth again?
Looks like we are together again for a while, huh?
I hope we make it back alive.
We are not going to die.
We will beat them and restore peace on Earth.
We do not have time to die.
But the antigravity device is being serviced!
What on Earth are you wearing?
Where is the uniform you were supplied with?
Well... it was not very cute.
It will not hinder her ability to helm the ship, so I will authorize it.
Mizusaki, shall I tell you why you cannot get a date?
Kataphrakt squadron, launch all operational units!
Its Aldnoah Drive's unique capability is Entropy Dilution.
It saps the molecular motion of all matter inside a field 1km in radius.
It creates super-low temperatures that can transform the air and freeze it.
show me how you defy the power of Aldnoah!
At its current rate of speed, it will reach the Deucalion's dock in 15 minutes.
We have to slow it down somehow...
We are going to destroy it.
We are going in in cold-weather mode.
It is not for nothing that its name is Frozen Elysium.
The chemical reaction in my batteries has stopped?
We have to think of a way to slow it down.
I thought you said we were going to destroy it!
The warheads entered a superconductive state
and were deflected by the Meissner Effect.
Let us see how air burst mode works.
Oh, the battery in the warhead froze and the processor locked up?
Where does the sapped heat go?
Is it shunting the molecular movement energy somewhere else in our dimension?
Flight distance for the warheads' electronic timer fuse,
I just need to reach him before then.
I took more damage than expected.
I wonder if Calm will be mad...
I have been assigned to your ship.
Come on, what is with that?
I am glad you are looking well.
You can make polite small talk now.
That is not really a compliment.
It is good to be back.
I have finished off the Terran soldier who has been a thorn in our side.
I have finally made up my mind.
Please forgive me for all the wrongs I have done you in the past,
and am sure to do in the future...
Many Terran troops have already breached the castle.
Let us escape in the Tharsis.
And take Princess Asseylum with us.
I am the only one who can save you now, Count.
Will you die with your ambitions unrealized?
Or choose to live with Princess Asseylum?
Bullet went through the temporal region via the left eye socket.
Three cc's of adrenaline administered as emergency treatment.
We have tools and facilities in the underground shelter!
Order the Deucalion to lift off!
The Terrans who so foolishly squandered the goodwill of the Vers Empire
are even now biding their time to attempt to steal our lands from us.
The Vers Empire must exterminate them out of mercy.
We shall take the blue Earth for Vers.
which possesses air and water in such quantities that it diffracts light
and makes the sky and seas appear blue,
from the hands of the barbaric Terrans.
It is Rayleigh scattering that makes the sky blue.
You were the very image of Princess Asseylum.
No one would ever suspect your true identity.
This is the problem with you men.
No one was speaking of true identities.
are sure to have left an impression on the Orbital Knights, as well.
I am more grateful for such concern than any compliments on my performance.
I am extremely and humbly delighted.
If there will be nothing else, Milord Slaine, I will take my leave now.
I see that you are in good spirits again today.
